alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 11:09AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...ELEVATED FIRE DANGER THIS AFTERNOON... Here is a fire danger statement issued in coordination with the Ohio and Kentucky Divisions of Forestry. A combination of dry and windy conditions will create an elevated risk of fire spread this afternoon into early this evening. Minimum relative humidity values are forecast to drop to between 30 and 35 percent, with sustained southwest winds of 10 to 15 mph, and gusts of 20 to 25 mph. Residents are urged to exercise caution if handling any potential ignition sources, such as machinery, cigarettes, or matches. If dry grasses and tree litter begin to burn, the fire will have the potential to spread rapidly. Ohio and Kentucky law prohibits burning in the spring from 6AM to 6PM.
